author: oheger
msg: InMemoryNodeModel.clearTree() now handles the special case that the root node is cleared.

author: oheger
msg: Added a clear() method to InMemoryNodeModel.
This method clears the whole model by replacing the root node by an empty one.

author: oheger
msg: InMemoryNodeModel.clearTree() now also supports removing attributes.

author: oheger
msg: Added a clearTree() method to InMemoryNodeModel.
With this method whole subtrees for the managed node structure can be removed.
The current implementation is still incomplete.

author: alexoree
msg: JUDDI-831 done, port of v3 tck tests
